lender.name: Pauline
lender.loan_because: These first loans are a gift from Pauline's children. Our mom has most of the material stuff she needs, so for Mother's Day, we simply decided to be inspired by her unsurpassed generosity and use the money we would have spent towards a gift on financing two loans that we hope will interest her- so she can see their progress and how they are put to use!
lender.occupational_info: Our Mom worked for many years in the travel industry before taking a break to take care of her children- us! She's always been there for us, she is incredibly supportive, and everything we are today we owe to her!! Although we don't show it often enough, all three of us love our Mom deeply, are very proud of her, and so very grateful for her care!

lender.name: Rikki
lender.loan_because: I believe you can empower people to do great things with just small acts of kindness.

lender.name: Penny

lender.occupational_info: I am a blood and marrow transplant nurse taking care of patients suffering from cancer.

Especially when you are comfortably organized and loving every minute of it.

lender.name: integratedaquaculture
lender.occupational_info:
integrated Aquaculture International, LLC (IAI) is a company headquartered in Hastings, Nebraska, USA. The company implements projects that are focused on achieving production efficiency and sustainability of aquaculture through synergy of genetics, health, nutrition, environment and management. Further, it seeks to build a unified network of clients who benefit from the synergy of collaboration.
Currently, IAI has projects and clients in Brazil, Brunei, China, Indonesia, Mexico and USA. Current services range from complete, integrated solutions to produce large and healthy shrimp (MegaPrawns¬Æ technology) to specific technical and market support programs for companies in the aquatic food supply chain.
IAI has a skilled and experienced technical team that serves the aquaculture industry with integrated solutions. Just as Aristotle concluded that "the whole is greater than the sum of the parts", we believe that only a holistic approach can address the range of issues that occur in real production environments.

To Go Brands introduces Acai Natural Energy Boost‚Ñ¢, an all-natural, organic, no sugar added, and healthy alternative in the Energy Drink category. It‚Äôs Healthy To Go! Packed with super-fruit antioxidants Organic Acai, Grape, Apple, Pomegranate, and Mango, Acai Natural Energy Boost‚Ñ¢ also features Chocamine‚Ñ¢, a proprietary, patent pending cocoa extract that offers the proven health benefits of chocolate without the sugar, fat and dairy. For a natural energy boost, simply add one convenient stick-pack to a bottle of your favorite water and Rip, Pour, Go‚Ñ¢! For more information, visit www.ToGobrands.com or call 866-494-8646.

lender.name: Gabrielle
lender.loan_because: I would not be where I am in my business today without a loan. I think everyone should have the opportunity to create an income to support their family.
lender.occupational_info: My family & I run a cafe, cooking & making coffee. I am also a busy mum of 4 kids.

lender.name: Umulisa
lender.loan_because: I have no job now. I am a former Secretary, but now I lose my job, so, I need loan for to begin my own business for to live my family. I am married and live with my husband and our 4 children. We have no others possibilities for to pay education fees of our children, health coast and foods. So, if I get loan from Kiva, I will start an individual public secretariat who will provide some incomes for my family.
lender.occupational_info: If I get loan, I want to set up my own work. I think to put a public secretariat because I have an experience in it. I have one computer with printer, and need some additional equipment as a copying machine or photocopier, scaner and others for to help me to start a good secretariat. With this equipment, I will gain some incomes for to live my family and can help some people who are in needs too. The loan a need from Kiva is evaluate at 1,300usd. In few months I will pay off the loan according to your agreement.
